title: Value2 not cleaned after converting operator from between to equal in highlight rule
description: The issue occurs when the highlight rule is defined as '2 between 1 and 3', with the color set to blue.
OB: After saving the report and inspecting the generated XML source, the value2 field should be cleaned in the highlight expression.
EB: However, in the actual result, when inspecting the XML source, value1 is set to 1 and value2 is set to 3.
SR: The expected behavior is that the value2 field is not included in the XML source, as it should be cleaned in the highlight expression.
